title: Artificial Intelligence
content: The article talks about how AI (for example, NASA algorithms) analyzes telescope data (TESS, Kepler) and discovers new exoplanets. The discovery of the TRAPPIST-1 system and the prospects for finding life are mentioned.

title: Colonization of Mars
content: An overview of the key obstacles to life on Mars: radiation, lack of a magnetic field, food and oxygen production. Projects by SpaceX, NASA, and terraforming ideas are mentioned.

title: Dark Matter
content: A simple explanation of what dark matter is, how it is detected (through gravitational effects), and why it is important for understanding the structure of the Universe.
